SUB_W06_WRLD_MIDO_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_WRLD_MIDO_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Holy moly, the range of worlds conjoined to the
Heavens is a lot more varied than I expected.
Am I inside some sort of body here?

SUB_W06_WRLD_MIDO_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_WRLD_MIDO_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Hope this isn't some kinda deal where I need
to bail before I get digested into a pile of goo.
In any case, better find whatever spirits are
here and get outta town right quick.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_SCAN_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_SCAN_000_CUT_000_000.text:
We got something. Hope this doesn't end
with me getting melted down or something.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Hey there, guy.
Can I ask you something?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Blurp! There it is! The foreign body that's
thrown the entire Kosmos into turmoil!

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Not here to throw anything into turmoil,
fella. I'm just looking for spirits.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Don't play dumb with me! You are clearly
a foreign body, and that spirit story
smells like a pile of excreta. Now prepare to be excised like
the malignant growth you are!

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text: Hey now, let's take it down a notch. Whatever's going on here isn't because of me. I mean, look at me—do I look like a malignant growth to you?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Hmm... I'll grant that you don't resemble a
typical malignancy, but you're also not
anything I've seen before. Yes, of course. Perhaps you're some sort
of benign growth, or even a—

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
I ain't a growth at all, guy! I'm Tsunanori.
That's a bit of a tricky one, but I know
you'll get the hang of it. Tsu-na-no-ri.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
A benign Tsunanori growth? Fascinating!
Yes, well, while benignancies are not subject
to excision, if this is an attempt at deception,
you will pay for it in blood and bile!

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
I am Byaku, a priest that protects
the integrity of the Kosmos.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Well, that sounds like a good deal for you.
Now about those spirits...

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Ah, yes. Well, while some believe the Kosmos
maintains balance through the circulation of
spirits, I am not among their number, for I
have never seen any manner of spirit myself.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
That said, you clearly appear set on searching
them out no matter what I say. I am willing to
help you in this, but as I am in the midst of
my rounds, it must wait until I complete them.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Well, I'd sure as shoot appreciate it.
How long you think these rounds'll take?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Oh, not too terribly long... Though things
would go faster if you were willing to help.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text: Just say the word, my blobby friend.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Excellent! Now then, my rounds often take me
to dangerous places. As my forte is defense,
I would be pleased if you could assume a more
offensive role.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text: So I do the fighting? Sure thing, guy.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Our first destination is over there,
so let us be off. Locomotion, ho!

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_000_CUT_000_00.text:
This is the Digestica, one of our four great
temples. At this holy site, substances from
the outer worlds are processed and broken
down to provide energy to the Kosmos.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_000_CUT_000_01.text: Sounds like a stomach to me there, guy. Heck, I guess this world really is inside some sort of living being.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_000_CUT_000_02.text:
Defending these temples is the primary
duty for those in the Order of Leukos.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_000_CUT_000_03.text:
Don't go taking this the wrong way, fella,
but this Digestica looks a bit...unhealthy?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_000_CUT_000_04.text:
Yes, I noticed this as well; an abnormality
seems to have emerged for some reason.
We will need to investigate at once.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_000_CUT_000_06.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_000_CUT_000_06.text:
A foreign body—and the malignant kind!
You must excise it at once!

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_000_CUT_010_00.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_000_CUT_010_00.text:
The malignancies that infiltrate the body
hide in all manner of places, and seek nothing
less than the destruction of the Kosmos.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_000_CUT_010_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_000_CUT_010_01.text:
I excised the heck outta that malignancy,
but the Digestica isn't looking any better.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_000_CUT_010_02.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_000_CUT_010_02.text:
Which means the source of the anomaly
must lie elsewhere. Have you noticed
anything unusual lately, Tsunanori?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_000_CUT_010_03.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_000_CUT_010_03.text: Hmm... Well, I guess I was sorta wondering about those oily clumps stuck to the pillars over there.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_000_CUT_020_00.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_000_CUT_020_00.text:
Ah, yes! Those are fat globules. While the Kosmos
requires them to function, I doubt the Digestica
would be able to process so many at once.
This may indeed be the anomaly we seek.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_000_CUT_020_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_000_CUT_020_01.text:
Sorta like when I eat too much greasy
food and end up with an upset tum.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_000_CUT_020_02.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_000_CUT_020_02.text:
We must destroy the fats. Let us break them
into smaller pieces so they will be easier for
the Digestica to process and unload.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_000_CUT_020_03.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_000_CUT_020_03.text:
The ol' divide and conquer, eh?
Let's get to it.

SUB_W06_GIMK_MIDO_FATCELLXX_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_GIMK_MIDO_FATCELLXX_010_CUT_000_.text:
To think that malignancies have infested
even this most sacred of lands...
We must be ever vigilant!

SUB_W06_GIMK_MIDO_FATCELLXX_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_GIMK_MIDO_FATCELLXX_010_CUT_000_.text: Sure surprised the heck outta me.

SUB_W06_GIMK_MIDO_FATCELLXX_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_GIMK_MIDO_FATCELLXX_010_CUT_000_.text:
That was the last of the fats.
If we repair the Digestica now,
it should resume its normal function.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_010_CUT_000_00.text:
That's the end of your rounds then, guy?
If so, I could really use your help to
track down those spirits.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_010_CUT_000_01.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_010_CUT_000_01.text:
The end? By the Kosmos, no!
Now we head to the other temples.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_010_CUT_000_02.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_010_CUT_000_02.text: Holy heck. This is gonna be a long day...

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_VEINS07_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_VEINS07_000_CUT_000_00.text:
The flow in this passage has been restored.
We can use it to reach our destination.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_VEINS07_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_VEINS07_000_CUT_000_01.text:
Cripes, are we really going through here? 
'Cause this looks like a vein, and I'm
sure as heck not a blood cell...

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_VEINS07_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_VEINS07_000_CUT_000_02.text:
Pray cease flapping your mandible
and come with me.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_VEINS07_000_CUT_010_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_VEINS07_000_CUT_010_00.text:
Sweet cheesin' cripes! Can't believe I
just got to swim through a blood vein!

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_000.text:
This is the Respiquary—the temple that
controls the atmosphere of the Kosmos.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_010.text:
So the lungs, then. Gotta say, this place
ain't lookin' so hot either.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_020.text: Byaku! How are you today, sir?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Ah, that's Blan, one of the junior priests.
He's been assigned to the Respiquary guard.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_060.text:
You sure about that there, guy? There's a
real strong wind blowing from over that way.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_070.text:
Of course there's a wind blowing out of it!
Do you not remember me telling you how
the Respiquary controls the atmosphere?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_080.text:
Is that weird foreign body
bothering you, sir!?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_090.text: No need to be rude about it, fella.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_100.text:
This is Tsunanori. Please treat him
as you would any of my subordinates.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_120.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_120.text: Also, now that you mention it, the wind is blowing a bit more strongly than usual. I wonder what that's about.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_000_CUT_010_010.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_000_CUT_010_010.text: Anomaly, sir! We have an anomaly!

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_000_CUT_010_020.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_000_CUT_010_020.text:
We must investigate this at once.
To the Respiquary!

SUB_W06_GIMK_MIDO_WIND_STORM01_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_GIMK_MIDO_WIND_STORM01_000_CUT_0.text:
Wind's too strong for us to come
at the Respiquary from the front.
We better approach from the side.

SUB_W06_GIMK_MIDO_WIND_STORM03_000_CUT_0.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_GIMK_MIDO_WIND_STORM03_000_CUT_0.text:
Blast! The wind's too strong to
approach it from this direction.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_010_CUT_000_000.text:
The Respiquary's condition is irregular.
It must be repaired at once.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_010_CUT_000_010.text:
Coulda just caught a cold
or something, maybe?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_010_CUT_000_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_010_CUT_000_030.text: It must have blown in on the wind.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_010_CUT_010_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_010_CUT_010_000.text:
Let us repair the Respiquary at once.
Give us a hand, Blan.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_010_CUT_020_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_010_CUT_020_000.text:
We merely slapped a bandage over the problem,
but that should keep it working for a while.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_010_CUT_020_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_010_CUT_020_010.text: Geez, you're pretty handy with this stuff.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_010_CUT_020_020.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_010_CUT_020_020.text:
Those born into the priesthood have a sacred
duty to protect the Kosmos, and have been
blessed with the power to repair the temples. One could say we are the chosen elite,
beings selected by the very Kosmos itself!

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_010_CUT_020_030.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_010_CUT_020_030.text:
Thank you for the assistance, sir!
I can take it from here!

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_010_CUT_020_040.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_010_CUT_020_040.text:
Good, because I must return to my rounds—
and between the events at the Digestica
and this, I fear some evil is afoot.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Well, heck. Unless I miss my guess,
this looks a lot like brain tissue.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_010.text:
This is the Cognitheon—the center of the Kosmos,
and the place that controls all other holy sites.
As I feared, there is an anomaly here. We must find and excise it with all speed,
for if the Cognitheon were to shut down
the entire Kosmos would descend into chaos.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_020.text:
So who's in charge of protecting
this place, anyway?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_030.text:
It should be guarded by a contemporary
of mine in the Order named Safed,
but I do not see him.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Welp, even if he's not around, we should
get after restoring the Cognitheon, eh?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Indeed. Whatever this anomaly is, it appears
to have severed the Cognitheon's connection
to the circuits which supply its power.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_060.text:
Sounds like a cerebral concussion, maybe?
Better fix it before brain tissue starts dying,
because holy moly, that'd be bad.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_070.text:
Oh dear. I have never seen such a thing.
I'm not even sure how to approach this...

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_080.text:
Don't go losing your nerve now, mister.
Let's get to investigating the situation.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_090.text:
I'm guessing those pokey deals around the
Cognitheon are the circuits, so... Ah!
That one there is different from the others.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_000_CUT_010_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_000_CUT_010_000.text:
While a small amount of electricity
is flowing over there, its range is
insufficient to reach the Cognitheon.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_000_CUT_010_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_000_CUT_010_010.text:
Don't wanna tell a fella his job or nothing,
but could we connect the circuits and get it
flowing to the Cognitheon that way, maybe?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_000_CUT_010_020.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_000_CUT_010_020.text: Interesting. Yes, that just might work.

SUB_W06_DECO_MIDO_NEURONHEALTHY_ALONE0_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_DECO_MIDO_NEURONHEALTHY_ALONE0_0.text:
Let's make us a connection from this
circuit to the one next to it.

SUB_W06_DECO_MIDO_NEURONHEALTHY_ALONE0_0.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_DECO_MIDO_NEURONHEALTHY_ALONE0_0.text:
A fine idea. But first, we must excise
the malignancies in the area.

SUB_W06_DECO_MIDO_NEURONHEALTHY_ALONE0_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_DECO_MIDO_NEURONHEALTHY_ALONE0_0.text:
Looks like we're all clear here.
Let's get that connection made.

SUB_W06_DECO_MIDO_NEURONHEALTHY_ALONE0_0.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_DECO_MIDO_NEURONHEALTHY_ALONE0_0.text:
Not all of the circuits are operating.
Select the ones that electricity seems
able to flow through, then link them.

SUB_W06_DECO_MIDO_NEURONSICK_ALONE1A_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido

SUB_W06_DECO_MIDO_NEURONSICK_ALONE1B_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_DECO_MIDO_NEURONSICK_ALONE1B_000.text:
Hot dang, we got juice! Now I just need to
keep doing this until we reach the Cognitheon.

SUB_W06_DECO_MIDO_NEURONSICK_ALONE2A_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido

SUB_W06_DECO_MIDO_NEURONSICK_ALONE3A_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido

SUB_W06_DECO_MIDO_NEURONSICK_ALONE3B_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_DECO_MIDO_NEURONSICK_ALONE3B_000.text:
All right, we have electricity flowing all
the way to the Cognitheon. Now to restore
power to the main part itself.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_005_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_005_CUT_000_000.text:
I need to link circuits together to get
electricity flowing into the Cognitheon.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_010_CUT_000_000.text: Think you can fix it there, guy?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_010_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_010_CUT_000_020.text:
Great. Then you do that while I focus
on excising these malignancies.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_000.text: Looks like we're back in business.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_010.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_010.text:
I could not have done it without you,
Tsunanori. You have my thanks.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_020.text:
Hm? Looks like we got a fella
on the ground over there.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_050.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_050.text:
Heavens, man! You're hurt!
What happened to you!?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_060.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_060.text: Holy moly, that wound's a gusher.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_070.speaker: Safed
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_070.text:
I'm sorry... I failed to defend the Cognitheon,
and now...I'm done for... I leave this place...
in your hands...

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_090.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_090.text:
Well, that's just a heck of a shame.
Looks like a malignancy got him.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_100.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_100.text:
Safed was the most powerful member of the
priesthood; no mere malignancy could have
ever laid him so low.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_110.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_110.text: Then what do you think did it?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_130.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_130.text: We must visit the next temple.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Well this here is a heart for sure.
How's it looking there, Byaku?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_000_CUT_000_010.text:
The Circuleum has completely stopped!
If we don't do something, all activity
in the Kosmos will soon cease—but I
have absolutely no idea WHAT to do!

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_000_CUT_000_020.text:
You need to calm down and have a think, guy.
The Circuleum handles circulation, which
means it's the heart. And when a person's
heart stops, you... Uh...

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Massage! That's it! You massage the dang thing!
Now I'm not much for massages, but if I ram into
the sucker real hard, I bet the impact will get
everything moving again!

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_000_CUT_000_040.text:
That sounds like a rather fanciful idea,
but even a thin hope is better than none.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_000_CUT_000_050.text: We're running out of time! Hurry!

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_DASH_ATTACK_POS1.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_DASH_ATTACK_POS1.text:
Build up some momentum from here
and then ram into the Circuleum.

SUB_W06_GIMK_MIDO_HEART_HIT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_GIMK_MIDO_HEART_HIT_000_CUT_000_.text:
Guess that's not enough force.
Maybe we need to start farther back?

SUB_W06_GIMK_MIDO_HEART_HIT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_GIMK_MIDO_HEART_HIT_000_CUT_000_.text: Curses! The malignancies have found us!

SUB_W06_GIMK_MIDO_HEART_HIT_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_GIMK_MIDO_HEART_HIT_010_CUT_000_.text: Hot dang! The Circuleum's moving again!

SUB_W06_GIMK_MIDO_HEART_HIT_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_GIMK_MIDO_HEART_HIT_010_CUT_000_.text: Good. Now stand back while I mend it.

SUB_W06_GIMK_MIDO_HEART_HIT_020_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_GIMK_MIDO_HEART_HIT_020_CUT_000_.text:
We may have given the Circuleum a little
too much of the ol' force there, but at least
the thing's moving again.

SUB_W06_GIMK_MIDO_HEART_HIT_020_CUT_000_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_GIMK_MIDO_HEART_HIT_020_CUT_000_.text: Good. Now stand back while I mend it.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_010_CUT_000_000.text: Can you fix it there, guy?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_010_CUT_010_000.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_010_CUT_010_000.text: Fine work on your rounds today, Byaku.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_010_CUT_010_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_010_CUT_010_020.text:
I'm guessing this fella's one of the
big wheels in the priesthood?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_010_CUT_010_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_010_CUT_010_030.text:
May I ask where you've been, Your Eminence?
I thought the Circuleum was your post.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_010_CUT_010_040.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_010_CUT_010_040.text:
I had urgent business elsewhere.
How are the other temples looking?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_010_CUT_010_050.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_010_CUT_010_050.text:
There were anomalies in all of them.
We took emergency measures in each case,
but the situation remains terribly unstable.
And I fear there is even worse news...

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_010_CUT_010_060.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_010_CUT_010_060.text:
Safed is dead. Murdered in cold blood
by an unknown assailant.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_010_CUT_010_070.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_010_CUT_010_070.text: Mmm. I'm sorry to hear it.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_010_CUT_010_090.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_010_CUT_010_090.text: May I ask a question, sir?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_010_CUT_010_110.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_010_CUT_010_110.text:
Why did you try to destroy the temples?
And why did you take Safed's life!?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_010_CUT_010_120.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_010_CUT_010_120.text:
Cripes, Byaku!
Where's this coming from!?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_010_CUT_010_130.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_010_CUT_010_130.text:
That is a dangerous accusation to be
bandying about without proof, Byaku.
Most dangerous indeed.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_010_CUT_010_140.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_010_CUT_010_140.text:
But I do have proof, Your Eminence.
For while malignancies caused the anomalies
at the temples, it is obvious the damage
was inflicted with great purpose.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_010_CUT_010_150.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_010_CUT_010_150.text:
Additionally, Safed's wounds were
clearly not the work of a malignancy,
but of a fellow priest.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_010_CUT_010_160.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_010_CUT_010_160.text:
And the only one who would have had the
opportunity to lay him low was you,
High Priest Valkoinen!

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_010_CUT_010_170.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_010_CUT_010_170.text:
Hmph! A fine deduction, Byaku. But what you
fail to grasp is that all I have done was in
accordance with the will of the Kosmos.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_010_CUT_010_180.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_010_CUT_010_180.text: How can you possibly claim such!?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_010_CUT_010_190.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_010_CUT_010_190.text:
...A malignancy? By the Kosmos!
The high priest has become malignant!

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_010_CUT_010_200.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_010_CUT_010_200.text:
And now, Byaku, it is the will of the
Kosmos that you join Safed in death.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_010_CUT_020_000.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_010_CUT_020_000.text:
The Kosmos has begun to initiate its own
ruination. Now let us see if you can resist
when your new destiny is bestowed upon
you by the universe itself!

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_010_CUT_020_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_010_CUT_020_010.text:
What in the heck's going on here!?
I'm not following any of this.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_010_CUT_020_020.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_010_CUT_020_020.text:
I've never heard of a benignancy turning into
a malignancy, nor of the Kosmos initiating its
own ruination. But I also cannot dismiss such
claims as mere tomfoolery.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_010_CUT_020_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_010_CUT_020_030.text:
Tsunanori, my rounds are now finished.
I am deeply grateful for your help,
and sorry to have imposed upon you.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_010_CUT_020_040.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_010_CUT_020_040.text:
No worries, guy. But, uh, what are you going
to do now? 'Cause it sure doesn't sound like
the situation's been resolved to me.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_010_CUT_020_050.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_010_CUT_020_050.text:
Maintaining peace within the Kosmos is my
sacred duty. Even if I must do it alone,
I will never cease my vigil.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_010_CUT_020_060.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_010_CUT_020_060.text:
No chance I'd abandon you after comin' all
this way together, bud! Besides, I still need
your help to track down spirits.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_010_CUT_020_080.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_010_CUT_020_080.text:
Are you certain? Though I cannot begin
to imagine what will happen next, I fear
you will be placing your life in danger.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_010_CUT_020_090.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_010_CUT_020_090.text: Fine by me. Now what's the plan?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_010_CUT_020_100.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_010_CUT_020_100.text:
We go to the place where priests are
born in search of further information.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_010_CUT_020_110.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_010_CUT_020_110.text: No place like home, eh? Let's go.

SUB_SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_TRACHEA_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_TRACHEA_000_CUT_00.text: Looks like I can leave through here.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Behold Thymus, the place from which we
priests hail. Most of the benignancies
that live in the Kosmos were born here.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_000_010.text:
As many benignancies still live here now,
one may know more about what's happening.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Don't wanna burst your bubble there,
but I don't see anybody at all.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Something is very wrong here,
Tsunanori. Be careful.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Hm? Hey now, wait a minute.
Who are those fellas over there?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Malignancies... And so many!
How did they manage to break in here?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_000_060.text:
I don't think they broke in at all.
I think they're good folks who went bad,
just like your big-deal priest.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_000.text: What can this mean? Could there possibly be an abnormality within the Kosmos itself?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_010.text:
Cripes, Byaku.
Got another one over here.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_020.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_020.text:
No, wait! I'm not malignant!
Are you two still normal?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_040.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_040.text:
You're a priest, right? Thank the Kosmos!
Not sure about the weird growth standing
next to you there, but...

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_060.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_060.text: You there. You're a carrier, yes?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_080.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_080.text:
Skittish cowards who run about dodging
malignancies as they transport things
from one place to another.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_090.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_090.text:
Oh, that's charming, especially coming from the
mouth of someone whose high priest was just killed.
Also, if you two are all that stands between chaos
and the Kosmos, I think we're all screwed.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_110.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_110.text:
Okay, let's all just simmer down a touch.
You there. Carrier lady. What's your name?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_130.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_130.text:
Erytheia, got it. Well, this is Byaku.
He's from the priesthood.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_140.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_140.text:
Do you even know what you were fighting
when you battled those malignancies earlier?
They used to be benign!

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_150.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_150.text:
Oh, we are very much aware; when the
high priest turned malignant earlier,
we were forced to end his life.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_170.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_170.text:
It would seem they all began to change after
hearing a divine message from the Kosmos.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_180.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_180.text:
The high priest also told us that the Kosmos
had initiated its own ruination. Do you know
anything about that, Carrier?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_190.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_190.text: No, but it wouldn't surprise me if the Kosmos decided to destroy itself. I mean, just take a look around. Things are bad.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_200.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_200.text:
So you think the Kosmos is turning everyone
bad in order to... I dunno. Kill itself?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_210.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_210.text:
Pretty much—but I'm not sure the Kosmos
actually knows that's what it's doing.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_220.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_220.text:
Mind breaking that down
for the new guy here?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_230.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_230.text:
The carrier is suggesting that someone has
interfered with the sacred will of the Kosmos
and is now pulling the strings, as it were.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_240.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_240.text:
Okay, but lemme ask this: what kind of
fella could control the will of a world?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_260.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_260.text:
The legendary malignancy that deceived God,
took control of the masses, and destroyed
the world? That's a fairy tale for zygotes!
Canker doesn't actually exist!

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_270.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_270.text:
Ah, but all folklore has foundation in fact.
Why can't it actually be a real event
that occurred in the long-distant past?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_280.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_280.text:
If we assume for the moment that you are
correct, I suppose the return of Canker would
be enough to explain these abnormalities...

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_290.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_290.text:
Swell! Let's go find this Canker fella
and beat him like laundry on the line.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_300.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_300.text:
You do not understand. Canker is immortal.
If he truly has returned to this world,
there is nothing we can do to stop him.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_310.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_310.text:
Actually, there might be one way—although
it would involve a priest like you working
very closely with a carrier like me.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_320.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_320.text:
Absurd! No priest would ever join forces
with a mere carrier!

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_330.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_330.text:
Figured you'd say that. Well, good luck
handling things by yourself, then!

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_340.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_340.text:
W-wait! It is my sworn duty to protect this world.
So for the sake of that duty, I will—just this
once—debase myself to a level where I cooperate
with your lowly self.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_350.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_350.text:
No. Please. Stop. I can't take
so much flattery all at once.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_360.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_360.text:
Anyway, I'll take that as a yes and go on
ahead. When you're ready, come outside
so I can explain the details.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_370.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_370.text:
Erytheia's selling a pretty crazy story.
You really think it's safe to trust her?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_380.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_380.text:
Oh, I trust her like I trust a cyst—
yet sadly, we have no other leads.
But the moment she does anything
strange...you know what to do.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text: Do you understand what this clump is?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text:
Hoo boy, that's nasty.
Reminds me of a tumor or something.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text:
This is one of Canker's roots. He uses these
to suck the life force of the Kosmos from its
temples, which is what allows him to grow.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text: Wait... Something's amiss at the temples!

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text:
Because of Canker, the balance of the
entire Kosmos has begun to collapse.
We don't have much time.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text:
Holy powers that have been sealed within
the four great temples—ones said to be
effective against even the power of Canker.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text:
Also, I find it very odd that you—a priest—
are unaware of this. I thought it was a secret
that was passed down through your order.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text:
Not nearly as odd as the fact that it's
known by a base carrier such as yourself!

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text:
Transmitting info is a carrier's job;
we tend to pick up whispers along the way.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text:
Yes, well, how do you intend to use these
antibodies against Canker when we don't
even know where the creature is?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text:
Easy! We pump 'em into his roots
at the sides of the temples.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text:
So we use his own roots against him?
Heck yeah, bud. I like it.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text:
You two can choose which temple to start with,
but we need to do this thing fast.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text:
Oh, and one more thing: we need the power
of prayer to unseal the antibodies,
which is where Byaku comes in.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_020_CUT_000_000.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_020_CUT_000_000.text:
It's time to extract the antibodies.
Get to praying, Byaku.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_020_CUT_000_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_020_CUT_000_030.text:
O ye who seek the antibodies...
I am the Circuleum.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_020_CUT_000_040.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_020_CUT_000_040.text:
That's the voice of the Circuleum.
It's controlling Byaku now.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_020_CUT_000_050.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_020_CUT_000_050.text: Why do you seek this power?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_020_CUT_000_060.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_020_CUT_000_060.text: Hey, who doesn't want more power?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_020_CUT_000_070.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_020_CUT_000_070.text: Gonna put the smackdown on Canker.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_020_CUT_000_080.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_020_CUT_000_080.text: Just saving the entire Kosmos. No big.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_020_CUT_000_100.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_020_CUT_000_100.text: Now let's pump this junk into the root!

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_CANCER_HEART_010_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_CANCER_HEART_010_CUT_0.text: Now we pump in the antibodies and...

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_CANCER_HEART_010_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_CANCER_HEART_010_CUT_0.text: Great. Let's swing by the next temple.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_00.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_00.text:
It's time to extract the antibodies.
Get to praying, Byaku.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_03.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_03.text:
O ye who seek the antibodies...
I am the Digestica.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_04.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_04.text:
We're now hearing the voice of the
Digestica speaking through Byaku.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_05.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_05.text:
Display to me thine wisdom so I might
deem you worthy of my antibodies.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_06.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_06.text: A test of wits? Nuts. I hate these.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_07.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_07.text:
Full is truth, and hungry is false.
Full, hungry, full, hungry expresses 10.
You supplicants must now express 100.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_08.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_08.text:
I think it wants us to figure out what
combination of the words 'full' and 'hungry'
will combine to express the number 100.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_09.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_09.text:
Uh, weird? But sure, why not.
So if full, hungry, full, hungry is 10,
then 100 would be...

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_12.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_12.text: Full, full, hungry, hungry, full, hungry, hungry.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_15.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_15.text:
Aw, nuts. Figures.
I had a feeling that wasn't it.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_17.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_17.text:
O ye who are bereft of wisdom,
show me instead thine might!

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_18.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_18.text: Now THAT I can deal with!

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_22.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_22.text:
Thy request is granted.
The antibodies are yours.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_23.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_23.text: Great. Now let's pump 'em into the root!

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_020_CUT_010_01.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_020_CUT_010_01.text:
Your might is impressive, supplicant.
The antibodies are yours.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_020_CUT_010_02.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_020_CUT_010_02.text: Great. Now let's pump 'em into the root!

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_CANCER_STOMACH_010_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_CANCER_STOMACH_010_CUT.text: All right. Let's pump those antibodies!

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_CANCER_STOMACH_010_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_CANCER_STOMACH_010_CUT.text: Great. Let's swing by the next temple.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_020_CUT_000_020.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_020_CUT_000_020.text:
I am sorry, Blan, but those who have become
malignancies can never again be benign.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_020_CUT_000_030.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_020_CUT_000_030.text:
Y-yes, of course... Forgive me, sir.
I...I won't cause you any trouble.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_020_CUT_000_040.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_020_CUT_000_040.text: Blan, no! What are you doing!?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_020_CUT_000_070.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_020_CUT_000_070.text: Sweet cripes. Guy took his own life.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_020_CUT_010_000.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_020_CUT_010_000.text:
It's time to extract the antibodies.
Get to praying, Byaku.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_020_CUT_010_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_020_CUT_010_030.text:
O ye who seek the antibodies...
I am the Respiquary.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_020_CUT_010_040.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_020_CUT_010_040.text:
We're now hearing the voice of the
Respiquary speaking through Byaku.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_020_CUT_010_050.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_020_CUT_010_050.text: To ye I bestow the antibodies.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_020_CUT_010_060.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_020_CUT_010_060.text:
Surprisingly easier than I thought.
Let's pump this junk into the root!

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_CANCER_LUNGS_010_CUT_0.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_CANCER_LUNGS_010_CUT_0.text:
The malignancies will get in the way.
Deal with them first!

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_CANCER_LUNGS_010_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_CANCER_LUNGS_010_CUT_0.text: Great. Let's swing by the next temple.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_020_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_020_CUT_000_010.text:
That guy's not Safed anymore, Byaku.
It's a malignancy. Safed is dead.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_020_CUT_000_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_020_CUT_000_030.text:
Alas, poor Safed. He deserves to be at peace.
Might I ask you to grant him that?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_020_CUT_010_000.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_020_CUT_010_000.text:
It's time to extract the antibodies.
Get to praying, Byaku.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_020_CUT_010_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_020_CUT_010_030.text:
O ye who seek the antibodies...
I am the Cognitheon.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_020_CUT_010_040.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_020_CUT_010_040.text:
We're now hearing the voice of the
Cognitheon speaking through Byaku.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_020_CUT_010_050.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_020_CUT_010_050.text: To ye I bestow the antibodies.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_020_CUT_010_060.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_020_CUT_010_060.text:
Surprisingly easier than I thought.
Let's pump this junk into the root!

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_CANCER_BRAIN_010_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_CANCER_BRAIN_010_CUT_0.text: Great. Let's swing by the next temple.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_CANCER_BRAIN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_CANCER_BRAIN_020_CUT_0.text: I no longer sense the presence of Canker.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_CANCER_BRAIN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_CANCER_BRAIN_020_CUT_0.text:
Yeah, but something's not right...
Look over there!

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text: The dang thing's unhealthy again!

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
And something is emerging
from the temple!

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text: Canker!? But we defeated him!

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
He's metastasized; his physical form
has already found refuge here.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
Well, what the heck do we do now?
We're fresh out of antibodies.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
Yes, but the antibodies have weakened him;
you should be able to destroy him now.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text: Hey, I'll take it. Let's go!

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text: Okay, so NOW it's over, right?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text: No. It's not.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
Oh, come the heck on, bud.
I killed Canker. Look, here's the corpse!

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text: Oh, he's dead all right...for the moment.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text: What do you mean, 'for the moment'?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
Canker is an immortal malignancy that
always returns to life eventually.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text: So we're hosed?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
No. The corpse must be removed from
the Kosmos so it can never again return.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
Madness! If we leave the Kosmos, we may never
be able to return! And even if we wanted to
take the risk, how can we possibly transport
so large a corpse!?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
You? You won't do anything.
But me? Well, I'm a carrier.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text: Oh heck, bud...

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
Needless to say, this will be my final task.
I'll head out right away.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
Carri... Nay, Erytheia. Thank you.
And please know that I am sorry.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
What's gotten into you, Byaku?
This isn't like you at all.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
Thanks for all your help too,
Tsunanori. Be well...and goodbye.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text: Yep. Catch you later.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_TRACHEA_010_CUT_000_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_TRACHEA_010_CUT_000_01.text:
So long, Byaku. It's been...
Well, it's been a deal.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_TRACHEA_010_CUT_000_02.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_TRACHEA_010_CUT_000_02.text:
A part of me wishes I could go with you,
but alas, my priestly duties require me
to remain here and protect the Kosmos.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_TRACHEA_010_CUT_000_03.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_TRACHEA_010_CUT_000_03.text:
Hey, I get it—and I'm sure you'll do
a great job protecting that big ol' bod.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_TRACHEA_010_CUT_000_04.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_TRACHEA_010_CUT_000_04.text:
While I'm not certain I understand what you mean,
I know you will use the power of the spirit you
found to protect something you hold most dear.
I wish you good luck with your duty.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_100_CUT_010_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_100_CUT_010_00.text:
Hey, so those things growing there?
What are they?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_100_CUT_020_00.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_100_CUT_020_00.text:
Those are the mucolisks. It is their duty to absorb
things which have been drawn into the Kosmos
and transport them to the Digestica.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_100_CUT_020_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_100_CUT_020_01.text:
So mucous membranes, maybe? Gotta say,
their color looks a little... Well, off.
You sure they're not sick?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_100_CUT_020_02.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_100_CUT_020_02.text:
Yes, something certainly seems to be amiss.
Perhaps they have been overloaded by excessive
activity? This would also explain why the
Digestica is in such poor condition.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_100_CUT_020_03.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_100_CUT_020_03.text:
So the Kosmos has an irritated tum.
Got any antacids lying around?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_100_CUT_020_04.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_100_CUT_020_04.text:
Fortunately, some of the mucolisks seem to
be functioning normally. Let us attempt to
harvest a bit of healthy mucus from them.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_100_CUT_030_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_100_CUT_030_00.text:
Okay, so I go gather mucus from those
healthy mucolisks guys with the good color
and then...what, exactly?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_100_CUT_030_01.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_100_CUT_030_01.text:
We culture the harvested mucus in the Digestica,
which will send it back out to the mucolisks.
Absorbing this new healthy mucus should bring
them back to their normal selves.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_100_CUT_030_02.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_100_CUT_030_02.text: Right then. Let's go find some snot.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_100_CUT_030_03.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_100_CUT_030_03.text:
Just watch for the overloaded mucolisks!
They'll absorb you if you get too close.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_100_CUT_030_04.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_100_CUT_030_04.text: Definitely not how I wanna go.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_105_CUT_000_00.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_105_CUT_000_00.text:
Go harvest mucus from the functioning mucolisks,
but watch out for the overloaded ones!
They'll absorb you if you get too close.

SUB_W06_GIMK_MIDO_DAMAGE_PILLAR_010_CUT_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_GIMK_MIDO_DAMAGE_PILLAR_010_CUT_.text: We should have enough mucus now.

SUB_W06_GIMK_MIDO_DAMAGE_PILLAR_010_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_GIMK_MIDO_DAMAGE_PILLAR_010_CUT_.text: Then back to the gut with us!

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_110_CUT_000_00.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_110_CUT_000_00.text:
Now the power of the Digestica will cultivate
the mucus and send it out to the mucolisks.
That should be enough to restore them.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_110_CUT_010_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_110_CUT_010_00.text:
Stomach looks nice and healthy now that
we restored the mucolisks, but why were
those guys overloaded in the first place?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_110_CUT_010_01.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_110_CUT_010_01.text:
I imagine they were reacting to an excessive—
and unknown—stimulus. We will need to perform
a full investigation at a later time.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_110_CUT_010_02.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_STOMACH_110_CUT_010_02.text: For now, we continue our rounds.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_100_CUT_000_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_100_CUT_000_000.text:
The Respiquary is the temple that regulates
the atmosphere of the Kosmos. We should find
my subordinate Blan somewhere around here.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_100_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_100_CUT_000_010.text: Lungs... I'm in a dang lung.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_100_CUT_000_020.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_100_CUT_000_020.text:
We have a serious problem here, sir!
A malignancy lurks in the alveoli!

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_100_CUT_000_040.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_100_CUT_000_040.text:
I'm not entirely sure, sir!
Probably one of the unhealthy ones?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_100_CUT_000_050.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_100_CUT_000_050.text:
Alveoli must be those air sac deals
that grow around here, eh?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_100_CUT_010_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_100_CUT_010_000.text:
The unhealthy alveoli are the darker ones.
Guess they have pneumonia or something?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_100_CUT_010_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_100_CUT_010_010.text:
Welp, there's a malignancy lurking behind one
of 'em, so I'm just gonna have to buckle down
and get to searching until I find it.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_100_CUT_010_020.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_100_CUT_010_020.text:
Look at this foreign body strolling around
like he owns the place! Should I take him
out with extreme prejudice, sir!?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_100_CUT_010_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_100_CUT_010_030.text:
Easy, Blan. He is my guardian—and while
he may be a foreign body, I trust he knows
about that of which he speaks.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_105_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_105_CUT_000_000.text:
I gotta search through all the unhealthy
alveoli until I find one with a malignancy.

SUB_W06_DECO_MIDO_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_DECO_MIDO_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.text:
I don't see any around here.
Any luck with you, Blan?

SUB_W06_DECO_MIDO_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_DECO_MIDO_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.text: It must be closer to the Respiquary.

SUB_W06_DECO_MIDO_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_DECO_MIDO_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.text: It might be further from the Respiquary.

SUB_W06_DECO_MIDO_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_DECO_MIDO_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.text:
It has to be somewhere on the side
closer to the Cognitheon.

SUB_W06_DECO_MIDO_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_DECO_MIDO_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.text:
It could be somewhere on the side
closer to the Digestica.

SUB_W06_DECO_MIDO_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_DECO_MIDO_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.text: Great! Let's take the sucker down!

SUB_W06_DECO_MIDO_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_DECO_MIDO_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.text:
Hang on... Oh yeah, I think there's
still a malignancy around here.

SUB_W06_DECO_MIDO_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_DECO_MIDO_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.text:
Maybe there's more of 'em?
Let's take a peek around.

SUB_W06_DECO_MIDO_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_DECO_MIDO_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.text:
I sense no more malignancies, sir.
I think we excised them all.

SUB_W06_DECO_MIDO_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_DECO_MIDO_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.text:
Then all that's left to do is
restore the Respiquary itself.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_110_CUT_000_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_110_CUT_000_000.text:
I will revive the Respiquary.
Lend me your aid, Blan.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_110_CUT_010_000.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_110_CUT_010_000.text: Everything should be fine now, sir!

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_110_CUT_010_010.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_110_CUT_010_010.text: Still, it's unusual for malignancies to attack around the Respiquary instead of simply assaulting it directly.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_110_CUT_010_020.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_110_CUT_010_020.text:
It's almost like they're learning, sir!
Which is VERY disturbing!

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_110_CUT_010_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_LUNGS_110_CUT_010_030.text:
Yes, well, the matter is settled now.
Best we move on.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_100_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_100_CUT_000_000.text: Gosh, this has to be the heart.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_100_CUT_000_010.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_100_CUT_000_010.text:
This is the Circuleum—that which maintains the
very life of the Kosmos. It is a temple guarded
by our High Priest Valkoinen himself.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_100_CUT_000_020.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_100_CUT_000_020.text:
Your Eminence! Are you here!?
It's Byaku, I've come on my rounds!

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_100_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_100_CUT_000_030.text: Looks like there's a fella over there.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_100_CUT_010_010.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_100_CUT_010_010.text:
High Priest Valkoinen!
Wh-what happened here?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_100_CUT_010_020.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_100_CUT_010_020.text:
We were attacked by a pack of malignancies.
I'm excising them as fast as I am able,
but there are simply too many to deal with.
You must lend me your aid!

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_100_CUT_010_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_100_CUT_010_030.text:
It would be my pleasure, Your Eminence.
Get them, Tsunanori!

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_100_CUT_020_010.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_100_CUT_020_010.text:
You are quite the potent warrior, friend.
But who are you, exactly?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_100_CUT_020_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_100_CUT_020_020.text:
Tsunanori. I'm defending Byaku
while he makes his rounds.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_100_CUT_020_030.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_100_CUT_020_030.text:
Is that so? Well, Tsunanori, I think I could
make use of your particular brand of help.
Will you hear my request?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_100_CUT_020_050.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_100_CUT_020_050.text:
As you have no doubt observed, there is an
abnormality in the Circuleum. I would like
to stop nibbling around the edges and deal
with the problem at its source.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_100_CUT_020_070.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_100_CUT_020_070.text:
No, the abnormality has a different source.
Look there, if you would.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_100_CUT_030_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_100_CUT_030_000.text: Thymus is enveloped in a wall of fat!

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_100_CUT_030_020.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_100_CUT_030_020.text:
Thymus is the homeland of all
who dwell within the Kosmos.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_100_CUT_030_030.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_100_CUT_030_030.text:
Every day, new citizens are born in Thymus.
The work they do serves as a major power
source for the Circuleum.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_100_CUT_030_040.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_100_CUT_030_040.text:
Sadly, the sudden appearance of that wall
is interfering with their activities.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_100_CUT_030_050.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_100_CUT_030_050.text:
So all your buds are stuck back there.
Well then, how do we break 'em out?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_100_CUT_030_070.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_100_CUT_030_070.text:
Uh, these are soft and rubbery...and sorta
gross, actually? The heck am I supposed to
do with these things?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_100_CUT_030_080.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_100_CUT_030_080.text:
Those are mitochondria. If you smear
them clockwise around the entire wall,
that should deal with the matter.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_100_CUT_030_090.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_100_CUT_030_090.text:
Clockwise? Can't say I really get the
logic here, but I'll give it a shot.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_100_CUT_030_100.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_100_CUT_030_100.text:
As I cannot abandon my post, I'm trusting
the two of you to deal with this in my stead.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_105_CUT_000_000.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_105_CUT_000_000.text:
You will need to circle around the wall
clockwise in order to smear the mitochondria
onto it and release those trapped within.

SUB_W06_GIMK_MIDO_FATWALLCIRCLE_010_CUT_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_GIMK_MIDO_FATWALLCIRCLE_010_CUT_.text: Ah, excellent! The wall is gone.

SUB_W06_GIMK_MIDO_FATWALLCIRCLE_010_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_GIMK_MIDO_FATWALLCIRCLE_010_CUT_.text:
I had no idea mitochondria could burn fat!
...Still don't get the whole clockwise deal
though, if I'm being honest.

SUB_W06_GIMK_MIDO_FATWALLCIRCLE_010_CUT_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_GIMK_MIDO_FATWALLCIRCLE_010_CUT_.text:
We should report our success
to the high priest at once.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_110_CUT_000_000.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_110_CUT_000_000.text:
My thanks for your efforts. The Circuleum
should be up and running again in no time.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_110_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_110_CUT_000_010.text:
Hey, so question, bud: why did I
have to apply that stuff clockwise?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_110_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_110_CUT_000_030.text: Aw, heck! Now I'm just more curious!

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_110_CUT_010_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_110_CUT_010_000.text:
If I may, Your Eminence, what made
that wall appear in the first place?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_110_CUT_010_010.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_110_CUT_010_010.text:
I don't know. Perhaps it was malignancies—or
perhaps not. Such a thing has not happened before,
and I intend to perform a full investigation.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_110_CUT_010_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_HEART_110_CUT_010_020.text:
We should probably swing by
the next temple, eh?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_100_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_100_CUT_000_000.text: Boy howdy, that sure looks like a brain.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_100_CUT_000_010.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_100_CUT_000_010.text:
That is the Cognitheon—the command center which
controls the other holy sites. A contemporary
of mine named Safed is in charge of its defense.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_100_CUT_000_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_100_CUT_000_030.text:
Ah, Safed. Any irregularities
here at the Cognitheon?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_100_CUT_000_040.speaker: Safed
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_100_CUT_000_040.text:
Something is definitely wrong here:
the electrical flow from the circuits
is unstable, which leaves the Cognitheon
running at a diminished capacity.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_100_CUT_000_050.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_100_CUT_000_050.text:
The circuits are these nerve clumps growing
around the temple, right? They sure did seem
a little... I dunno. Crackly?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_000.text:
There's something rather strange
about the circuits over that way.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_010.text:
Maybe the nerves went a bit raw because
of stress? That stress is a killer,
believe you me.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_030.text: That is Tsunanori. He's protecting me.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_040.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_040.text:
So repairing those circuits should
solve our little problem, eh?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_050.speaker: Safed
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_050.text:
Much as I'd love to do that, keeping the
Cognitheon running is a full-time job.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_070.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_070.text:
Do not overstep, Tsunanori;
you are here strictly to protect me.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_080.speaker: Safed
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_080.text:
Seems like quite a protector!
I know I'd appreciate his help.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_090.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_090.text:
Hold, Tsunanori. You won't be able to
repair them alone. I'll come with you.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_110.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_110.text: Despite my insistence on accompanying you, I don't actually have the faintest idea how to go about repairing them.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_120.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_120.text:
Well, not that I'm a pro or anything,
but it looks like there's a sort of
pattern to the flickering, maybe?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_130.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_130.text:
Of course! The order in which they're flickering
is the way the electricity flows, which means
we should fix them in the same order.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_140.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_140.text:
Sounds good to me, guy.
Let's give it a shot.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_105_CUT_000_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_105_CUT_000_000.text:
They're flickering in the same order as the
flow of electricity, which means we need to
fix them in the order of the flickers.

SUB_W06_DECO_MIDO_NEURONSICK_100_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_DECO_MIDO_NEURONSICK_100_CUT_000.text: Darn it! I messed up the order!

SUB_W06_DECO_MIDO_NEURONSICK_100_CUT_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_DECO_MIDO_NEURONSICK_100_CUT_000.text: Then we start over from the beginning.

SUB_W06_DECO_MIDO_NEURONSICK_110_CUT_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_DECO_MIDO_NEURONSICK_110_CUT_000.text:
Let us return to the Cognitheon
and report our success to Safed.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_110_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_110_CUT_000_000.text: Got your circuits fixed there, guy.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_110_CUT_000_010.speaker: Safed
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_110_CUT_000_010.text:
Wonderful! In that case, the Cognitheon
should return to normal capacity soon.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_110_CUT_000_020.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_110_CUT_000_020.text:
Except... Oh no! It's being infiltrated
by malignancies! Tsunanori, please!

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_110_CUT_010_000.speaker: Safed
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_110_CUT_010_000.text:
The Cognitheon has been restored.
Thank you both for your help.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_110_CUT_020_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_110_CUT_020_000.text:
I still don't understand why the circuits
failed in the first place, but I suppose
we'll have to accept this as good enough.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_110_CUT_020_010.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_110_CUT_020_010.text: Now then, on with my rounds!

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_PATROL_END_CUT_000_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_PATROL_END_CUT_000_000.text:
That completes my rounds. You were quite
a big help, Tsunanori—my apologies at
having kept you for so long.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_PATROL_END_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_PATROL_END_CUT_000_010.text:
Sure thing. Er, but about the whole
'helping me find spirits' deal?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_PATROL_END_CUT_000_020.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_PATROL_END_CUT_000_020.text:
Spirits are said to circulate throughout the
Kosmos. According to that theory, there is a
fire spirit in the Cognitheon, and a water
spirit within the Digestica. You are free to go see the truth of this
for yourself. As for me, I have other duties
which must be attended to.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_PATROL_END_CUT_000_060.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_PATROL_END_CUT_000_060.text: You're a strange one...but I am happy to have the protection.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_PATROL_END_CUT_000_080.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_PATROL_END_CUT_000_080.text: I have business in Thymus. Let us be off!

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_010.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_010.text:
I had a feeling you'd come once I heard
the news, Byaku. Er, but who's this?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_030.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_030.text:
Fair enough. Well, I'm Erytheia,
and I'm a carrier.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_040.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_040.text:
Carriers risk their lives transporting both
objects and information from place to place.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_050.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_050.text:
Sounds like a heck of a job. So do we
need something hauled around, maybe?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_060.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_060.text:
No. We are here to access her vast knowledge.
Erytheia, do you have any insights into this
strange string of recent incidents?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_070.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_070.text:
Well, it's certainly different from the
malignancies' usual routine. It's almost like
they're observing how we go about our work.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_080.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_080.text:
So their goal is not to destroy the Kosmos,
but to learn more about it?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_090.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_090.text:
That tracks with what I've seen.
The question is, why?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_100.speaker: RedBloodCell
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_100.text:
Halp! Haaalp! A giant foreign body has
appeared outside—one we've never seen!

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_000.text: That's one humdinger of a malignancy.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_010.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_010.text:
That's not a malignancy—it's a parasite.
I never imagined I'd see one with my
own eye, but here we are.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_020.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_020.text:
I've heard of parasites: they're bothersome
foreign bodies that suck the life from
other, better creatures.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_030.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_030.text:
Parasites possess the ability to control
malignancies; I think it's safe to conclude
that all of this is their doing.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_040.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_040.text: Okay, sure. So what do they want?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_050.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_050.text:
Probably to take over the Kosmos, though I
have no idea how they intend to do it.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_060.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_060.text:
I will never permit that to happen.
Excise them, Tsunanori!

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_PARASITE_HEART_100_CUT.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_PARASITE_HEART_100_CUT.text: Excise them all! Let none survive!

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_PARASITE_STOMACH_100_C.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_PARASITE_STOMACH_100_C.text: You got me to deal with now, guy!

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_PARASITE_LUNGS_100_CUT.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_PARASITE_LUNGS_100_CUT.text:
Your devious schemes end here,
foul parasite!

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_PARASITE_BRAIN_100_CUT.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_PARASITE_BRAIN_100_CUT.text: I will never let you take the Kosmos!

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_PARASITE_LAST_100_CUT_.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_PARASITE_LAST_100_CUT_.text: That should be the last of the parasites.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_PARASITE_LAST_100_CUT_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_PARASITE_LAST_100_CUT_.text: Wait! Something's amiss at the Cognitheon!

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_PARASITE_LAST_100_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_PARASITE_LAST_100_CUT_.text: Well, gosh. What could've caused this?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_120_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_120_CUT_000_010.text:
Aw, heck! We missed one of
the parasite fellas!

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_120_CUT_000_020.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_120_CUT_000_020.text: The Cognitheon is the brain of the Kosmos. If the parasite can establish itself there, it can usurp its will and become the Kosmos!

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_120_CUT_000_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_120_CUT_000_030.text:
Perhaps that was the plan all along and
the other parasites were but distractions.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_120_CUT_000_040.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_120_CUT_000_040.text:
And we completely fell for it.
A massive miscalculation!

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_120_CUT_000_050.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_120_CUT_000_050.text:
The parasite has already begun to fuse!
It's sucking power out of the Cognitheon
in order to strengthen itself!

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_120_CUT_000_060.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_120_CUT_000_060.text: There's gotta be some way to stop it.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_120_CUT_000_070.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_120_CUT_000_070.text:
Wait, look at the circuits over there...
They're still operating—though barely.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_120_CUT_010_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_120_CUT_010_000.text: Those are the circuits we repaired earlier.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_120_CUT_010_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_120_CUT_010_010.text:
So let's just fix 'em again, maybe?
That should provide enough power for the
Cognitheon for it to fight off that critter.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_120_CUT_010_020.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_120_CUT_010_020.text: It's certainly worth a try. Er, do you know how to do that?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_120_CUT_010_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_120_CUT_010_030.text:
I figure we just fix 'em in the order
they're blinking like we did before.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_120_CUT_010_040.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_120_CUT_010_040.text:
We'll only have one chance at this.
Go, Tsunanori! For the Kosmos!

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_125_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_125_CUT_000_000.text:
I gotta fix the circuits in the order
that they're flickering.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_125_CUT_000_010.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_125_CUT_000_010.text: We have but one chance! Hurry!

SUB_W06_DECO_MIDO_NEURONSICK_120_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_DECO_MIDO_NEURONSICK_120_CUT_000.text:
No time for more jury-rigging;
we'll have to fight this chump!

SUB_W06_DECO_MIDO_NEURONSICK_130_CUT_000.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_DECO_MIDO_NEURONSICK_130_CUT_000.text:
Your repairs stopped the parasite from
seizing control, and also gave the
Cognitheon the power to fight it off.

SUB_W06_DECO_MIDO_NEURONSICK_130_CUT_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_DECO_MIDO_NEURONSICK_130_CUT_000.text:
That gives us a chance to excise
the parasite for good!

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_130_CUT_010_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_130_CUT_010_000.text: It's stopped moving. Did we kill it?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_130_CUT_010_010.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_130_CUT_010_010.text:
No, it's still alive. Blast,
but it's a tenacious one!

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_130_CUT_020_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_130_CUT_020_000.text:
With the flow of electricity severed,
it will attempt to take over again.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_130_CUT_020_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_130_CUT_020_010.text: Then we'd better fix the circuits.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_131_CUT_010_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_131_CUT_010_000.text: It's stopped moving. Did we kill it?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_131_CUT_010_010.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_131_CUT_010_010.text:
No, it's still alive. Blast,
but it's a tenacious one!

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_131_CUT_010_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_131_CUT_010_020.text:
But at least we have another chance to fix
the circuits, eh? Let's do it right this time!

SUB_W06_DECO_MIDO_NEURONSICK_140_CUT_000.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_DECO_MIDO_NEURONSICK_140_CUT_000.text:
The parasite's on the move again!
Get back to the Cognitheon!

SUB_W06_DECO_MIDO_NEURONSICK_150_CUT_000.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_DECO_MIDO_NEURONSICK_150_CUT_000.text:
The parasite's been repelled!
Now's our chance!

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_140_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_140_CUT_000_000.text: Gonna end you for good this time!

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_140_CUT_010_010.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_140_CUT_010_010.text:
Thank you for your help, Tsunanori.
We couldn't have done it without you.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_140_CUT_010_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_140_CUT_010_020.text:
Eh, I dunno. I feel like I learned
quite a bit here myself.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_140_CUT_010_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_BRAIN_140_CUT_010_030.text:
If the theory that spirits circulate through
the Kosmos is accurate, there should be a
fire spirit in the Cognitheon.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_00.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_00.text: And here is the way out.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_02.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_02.text: Tsunanori, wait! Take me with you!

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_04.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_04.text:
Deadly so. In fact, I'm going with you
whether you want me to or not!

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_05.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_05.text: Ha ha ha! Just take him already.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_06.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_06.text:
Sounds like I don't got much choice.
Well, whatever floats your boat.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_08.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_08.text:
Goodbye, old friend!
See you again someday.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000_000.text:
This right here is where the
spirit power resides.

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000_010.text:
I don't believe any of us in the priesthood have
ever beheld a spirit before. Perhaps the Kosmos
has temporarily returned to the state it was in
at the moment of its conception?

SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W06_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Well, whatever the case, I better do
this thing before it disappears.
